trans-unit.source: – Brett Bymaster, Youth Pastor, The River Church Community
– Luke Martin, Student
– Mary Lai, Parent
– Rick Schertle, Teacher, Steindorf STEAM School
– Terri Furton, Principal, Downtown College Prep
100% Test Coverage

Free Python Games is an Apache2 licensed collection of free Python games intended for education and fun. The games are written in simple Python code and designed for experimentation and changes. Simplified versions of several classic arcade games are included.
trans-unit.target: Free Python Games是Apache2许可的免费Python游戏集合，旨在用于教育和娱乐。这些游戏是用简单的Python代码编写的，旨在进行实验和更改。包括几个经典街机游戏的简化版本。

trans-unit.source: Cannon – projectile motion. Click the screen to fire your cannnonball. The cannonball pops blue balloons in its path. Pop all the balloons before they can cross the screen.
trans-unit.target: 大炮-弹丸运动。单击屏幕发射您的炮弹。炮弹在其路径中弹出蓝色气球。弹出所有气球，然后才能越过屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Connect – Connect 4 game. Click a row to drop a disc. The first player to connect four discs vertically, horizontally, or diagonally wins!
trans-unit.target: 连接-连接4游戏。单击一行以放入光盘。第一个垂直，水平或对角线连接四张光盘的播放器获胜！

trans-unit.source: Fidget – fidget spinner inspired animation. Click the screen to accelerate the fidget spinner.
trans-unit.target: Fidget –受烦恼微调的动画。单击屏幕以加速烦躁微调器。

trans-unit.source: Flappy – Flappy-bird inspired game. Click the screen to flap your wings. Watch out for black ravens as you fly across the screen.
trans-unit.target: Flappy – Flappy-bird启发游戏。单击屏幕拍打翅膀。当您飞越屏幕时，请当心黑乌鸦。

trans-unit.source: Life – Conway’s Game of Life. The classic, zero-player, cellular automation created in 1970 by John Conway.
trans-unit.target: 生活–康威的人生游戏。约翰·康威（John Conway）于1970年创立的经典，零玩家的蜂窝自动化技术。

trans-unit.source: Maze – move from one side to another. Inspired by A Universe in One Line of Code with 10 PRINT. Tap the screen to trace a path from one side to another.
trans-unit.target: 迷宫–从一侧移到另一侧。受宇宙启发的一行10 PRINT代码。点击屏幕可跟踪从一侧到另一侧的路径。

trans-unit.source: Memory – puzzle game of number pairs. Click a tile to reveal a number. Match two numbers and the tiles will disappear to reveal an image.
trans-unit.target: 记忆–数字对的益智游戏。单击磁贴以显示数字。匹配两个数字，图块将消失以显示图像。

trans-unit.source: Pacman – classic arcade game. Use the arrow keys to navigate and eat all the white food. Watch out for red ghosts that roam the maze.
trans-unit.target: 吃豆子–经典街机游戏。使用箭头键导航并食用所有白色食物。提防漫游迷宫的红色幽灵。

trans-unit.source: Paint – draw lines and shapes on the screen. Click to mark the start of a shape and click again to mark its end. Different shapes and colors can be selected using the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 绘画–在屏幕上绘制线条和形状。单击以标记形状的起点，然后再次单击以标记形状的终点。可以使用键盘选择不同的形状和颜色。

trans-unit.source: Pong – classic arcade game. Use the keyboard to move your paddle up and down. The first player to miss the ball loses.
trans-unit.target: 傍–经典街机游戏。使用键盘上下移动键盘。第一位错过球的球员输了。

trans-unit.source: Simon Says – classic memory puzzle game. Click the screen to start. Watch the pattern and then click the tiles in the same order. Each time you get the sequence right the pattern gets one step longer.
trans-unit.target: 西蒙说-经典的记忆益智游戏。单击屏幕开始。观察图案，然后以相同顺序单击图块。每次您正确设置序列，模式都会增加一个步骤。

trans-unit.source: Snake – classic arcade game. Use the arrow keys to navigate and eat the green food. Each time the food is consumed, the snake grows one segment longer. Avoid eating yourself or going out of bounds!
trans-unit.target: 蛇-经典街机游戏。使用箭头键导航并食用绿色食品。每次食用食物，蛇就会长出一段。避免自己进食或出界！

trans-unit.source: Tic Tac Toe – classic game. Click the screen to place an X or O. Connect three in a row and you win!
trans-unit.target: 井字游戏–经典游戏。单击屏幕放置一个X或O。连续连接三个，您就赢了！

trans-unit.source: Tiles – puzzle game of sliding numbers into place. Click a tile adjacent to the empty square to swap positions. Can you make the tiles count one to fifteen from left to right and bottom to top?
trans-unit.target: 瓷砖–将数字滑动到位的益智游戏。单击与空正方形相邻的图块以交换位置。您能从左到右，从下到上地数一到十五张吗？

trans-unit.source: Tron – classic arcade game. Use the keyboard to change the direction of your Tron player. Avoid touching the line drawn by your opponent.
trans-unit.target: Tron –经典街机游戏。使用键盘更改Tron播放器的方向。避免碰到对手画的线。

trans-unit.source: “Free Python Games are great because they really engage students and let them learn at their own pace.”
trans-unit.target: “免费的Python游戏之所以很棒，是因为它们可以真正吸引学生，并让他们按照自己的节奏学习。”

trans-unit.source: “Free Python Games combines play and learning in a flexible environment that reduces the stress of a difficult topic like programming.”
trans-unit.target: “免费的Python游戏在灵活的环境中将游戏与学习结合在一起，从而减轻了诸如编程之类的难题的压力。”

trans-unit.source: “Free Python Games inspired and introduced a new hobby to our son. Thank you so much for exposing him to coding. He is having so much fun!”
trans-unit.target: “免费的Python游戏启发了我们，并给我们的儿子带来了新的爱好。非常感谢您让他接触编码。他玩得很开心！”

trans-unit.source: “Free Python Games is great for students, is highly organized and flexible, and seeks to unleash inquiry and understanding.”
trans-unit.target: “免费的Python游戏非常适合学生，具有高度的组织性和灵活性，并寻求释放查询和理解的能力。”

trans-unit.source: “I love Free Python Games because the games are fun and they’re easy to understand and change. I like making my own games now.”
trans-unit.target: “我喜欢Free Python Games，因为这些游戏很有趣，而且易于理解和更改。我现在喜欢自己做游戏。”

trans-unit.source: Any of the listed games may be played by executing the Python module from the command-line. To reference the Python module, combine “freegames” with the name of the game. For example, to play the “snake” game run:
trans-unit.target: 通过从命令行执行Python模块，可以玩任何列出的游戏。要引用Python模块，请将“ freegames”与游戏名称结合使用。例如，运行“蛇”游戏：

trans-unit.source: Cannon
Connect
Copyright 2017-2020 Grant Jenks
Depends only on the Python Standard Library
Designed for education
Developed on Python 3.7

Each game is entirely independent from the others and includes comments along with a list of exercises to work through with students. Creativity and flexibility is important. There is no right or wrong way to implement a new feature or behavior! You never know which games students will engage with best.
trans-unit.target: 每一个游戏都是完全独立的,包括评论以及与学生一起练习的清单。创造性和灵活性是很重要的。实施一个新的功能或行为没有正确或错误的方式!你永远不知道哪些游戏学生会参与得最好。你永远不知道哪些游戏学生会参与得最好。

trans-unit.target: 对于想要了解更多细节的人来说,这部分文档描述了课程、API和开发。

Free Python Games supports a command-line interface (CLI). Help for the CLI is available using:
trans-unit.target: Free Python Games 支持一个命令行界面 (CLI)。CLI 的帮助可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Fully Documented
Fun to play!
Games can be modified by copying their source code. The copy command will create a Python file in your local directory which you can edit. For example, to copy and play the “snake” game run:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过复制游戏的源代码来修改游戏。复制命令将在您的本地目录中创建一个Python文件，您可以对其进行编辑。例如，要复制并玩“蛇”游戏，请运行：

Python includes a built-in text editor named IDLE which can also execute Python code. To launch the editor and make changes to the “snake” game run:
trans-unit.target: Python包含一个名为IDLE的内置文本编辑器，该编辑器也可以执行Python代码。要启动编辑器并更改“ snake”游戏的运行，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Python is one of the top-five most popular programming languages in the world and available for free from Python.org. Python includes an extensive Standard Library distributed with your installation. The Standard Library has a module called Turtle which is a popular way to introduce programming to kids. Turtle was part of the original Logo programming language developed by Wally Feurzig and Seymour Papert in 1966. All of the games in Free Python Games are implemented using Python and its Turtle module.
trans-unit.target: Python是世界上最流行的五种编程语言之一，可从Python.org免费获得。Python包括随您的安装一起分发的大量标准库。标准库有一个称为Turtle的模块，这是一种向孩子介绍编程的流行方法。Turtle是Wally Feurzig和Seymour Papert于1966年开发的原始徽标编程语言的一部分。Free Python Games中的所有 游戏都是使用Python及其Turtle模块实现的。

trans-unit.source: Quickstart
References
Simon Says
Simple Python code
Snake

Starting in 2012, Free Python Games began as an after school program to teach programming to inner-city youth. The goal was to have fun as much as it was to learn. Since then the games have been improved and used in a variety of settings ranging from classrooms to summer day-camps.
trans-unit.target: 从2012年开始，免费Python游戏作为课外活动开始，旨在向城市中的年轻人传授编程知识。目标是获得与学习一样多的乐趣。从那以后，游戏得到了改进，并在从教室到夏令营的各种环境中使用。

trans-unit.source: Talk: Give the Gift of Python
Tested on CPython 2.7, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, and 3.7
Tested on Windows, Mac OS X, Raspbian (Raspberry Pi), and Linux
trans-unit.target: 在Windows、Mac OS X、Raspbian (Raspberry Pi)和Linux上测试。

trans-unit.source: Tested using Travis CI and AppVeyor CI
trans-unit.target: 使用Travis CI和AppVeyor CI进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Testimonials
The CLI supports three commands: list, copy, and show. For a list of all games run:
trans-unit.target: CLI支持三个命令:列表、复制和显示。对于所有游戏的列表运行。

trans-unit.source: The games run anywhere Python can be installed which includes desktop computers running Windows, Mac OS, or Linux and older or low-power hardware such as the Raspberry Pi. Kids across the United States in grades 6th-12th have enjoyed learning about topics such as encryption and projectile motion through games.
trans-unit.target: 这些游戏可以在任何可以安装Python的地方运行,包括运行Windows、Mac OS或Linux的台式电脑,以及旧的或低功耗的硬件,如Raspberry Pi。全美国6-12年级的孩子们都喜欢通过游戏来学习加密和弹丸运动等主题。
